title: Tutorial
text:
Type in a Title for your Notes, then type in a body for your Notes.
When you've finished typing, click the SAVE icon (upper right, first icon) to save!

title: Tutorial 2
text: You can click any previously made Notes to display it on the main area!

title: Tutorial 3
text: If you've clicked on a note, but want to write another note, simply click the pencil icon (upper right) and it will allow you to type a new note!
